product.name: Extra Wide Baby Gates Large Long Dog Gates for The House Doorways Stairs Pressure Mount Dog Pet Gate Walk Through Metal Child Indoor Safety Gates (White, 76.38"-86.3"/194-219CM)
product.description: The COSEND large long opening extra wide baby gate pressure mounted and small narrow baby gate is easy to install and extend to fit many home spaces. Adjustable walk through baby gates pressure mounted fit openings from 24-81 inch. The large dog gate for the house stairs and doorways kitchens living rooms bedrooms is easy to open and close with single hand. Hold-open feature can keep the indoor safety gate open and easily walk through without always opening and closing.Simultaneously auto-closed design can save your time. Product Feature: Convenient One-hand Operation Auto-closed Design to Save Your Time Sturdy Enough to Keep Your Baby Safe Double-Locks Design for Extra Security Dual-swinging Doors Convenience to Use Unique Matte Design, white and black colors can choose, classic and stylish Adjustable Gate Fit Openings from 24-81 inches wide Pressure-mounted&Hardware-mounted are available Unique Matte Design Will Reduce the Scratches on Gates Black and white two colors can choose Attention: 1. Do not cut the tie that holds the door to the child gate before finish installing. 2.There is a gap before you install it,this is not defective or bent.If you find that after you tight the bolts there is still a big gap ,pls continue tight the up two bolts until shorten the gap. 3.Leave a distance for the gap,normally you need to leave about 0.4'' for the gap,otherwise too tight so you can not open the gate 4.If you can not open the gate,pls loose the up two bolts. 5.When use for cylindrical stairs need to buy U type bolt, the U type bolt is not included in our box. 6.This product will not necessarily prevent all accidents, please never leave child unattended."
product.bullet_points:
• Double-sided & Auto Close-Our Large Extra wide pressure mounted baby gate will auto close when handle released.The gates for kids or pets includes a Hold- Opening feature when the large baby gate opening angle is 90° to keep the gate opened easily walk through without always opening and closing. The indoor safety baby gate has a 180° two-way open design which allows you to open in two directions for easy entry and exit.
• Double Locks System-The extra wide baby gate pressure mounted handle design makes it easy for adult to open： simply press the button, lift up the walk thru baby gate to open the door with single hand. But it is difficult to open it by little kids. Ultra-secure, a double-locking option up and down design to ensure the large baby gate is securely installed for optimal security.
• Durable & Sturdy Design-Our auto close extra wide baby gate / pet gate / child gate makes from sleek steel,which is larger diameter and more durable.the large extra wide walk through baby gate pressure mounted is sturdy enough to bear the impact of 180 pounds!The spacing between the round tubes is only 2.16" which is perfect for blocking little cats or dogs.
• Multi Use Design-Using this extra wide dog gate for the house,doorways,stairs,kitchen and other outside spaces,this will prevent your pets or dogs cats damage important things of the other rooms, Additional baby gate extensions allow you to extend the width of your baby gate extender for other spaces in the home,suit for living room kitchen doorways and stairs .Fit wide openings from 24 inch to 105 inch.The safety baby or pet gate can keep babies away from the dangerous kitchen or stair.
• Easy to install & Unique Matte Design-Our tension indoor safety baby gates extra wide for indoor and outdoor comes with 4 adjustable pressure bolts, which is easy for quick installation: no tools required, no need drilling holes and no damage to your wall.The unique Matte design makes the narrow baby gate and extra wide baby gate more stylish and reduce the scratches.
